Docs.summary: Defines the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> base class and a set of types that derive from it and that correspond to [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_avalonwinfx](../add/includes/tlasharptla-avalonwinfx-md.md)] controls. Each <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> exposes the corresponding [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_avalonwinfx](../add/includes/tlasharptla-avalonwinfx-md.md)] control to [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uiautomation](../add/includes/tlasharptla-uiautomation-md.md)].
